Once again, the Trump Administration is ignoring climate science and evidence of the devastation already occurring in our communities. This move to block states from being able to #ActOnClimate is reckless climate denial of a kind we can no longer afford.
Worst of all, this drags us backwards on the #climatecrisis! Transportation is the leading source of U.S. greenhouse gas emissions, and light-duty vehicles account for nearly 60% of those emissions!

All of this helps explain why numerous automakers have come out strongly against the Trump Administration‚Äôs proposal and in support of meaningful, predictable year-over-year increases to this powerful standard: https://www.nytimes.com/2019/06/06/climate/trump-auto-emissions-rollback-letter.html¬†‚Ä¶

As we stand still, other nations continue to race forward to develop the next generation of innovative vehicle technologies, virtually guaranteeing future jobs, investments and even new industry creation will happen beyond America's shores.

This Administration has also pushed to undo future federal clean car standards, even though their own analysis shows this bizarre move will result in significantly more pollution and domestic job loss.

This misguided move throws it to the courts, triggering years of uncertainty for America's auto industry. Over and over we have heard this Administration pay lip service to cooperative federalism; apparently that only applies to states advancing their extreme deregulation agenda.

Let's be clear: the President has no legal process or justification for revoking this waiver. The Clean Air Act gives California a right to seek it and other states, including New York, have the right to adopt their strong standards.

Add these to your list of false claims by President Trump. CA clean car standards have been great for U.S. consumers, our country and planet. This revocation defies the rights of states including New York to protect our citizens. It has no basis in law, economics or common sense. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1174342163141812224¬†‚Ä¶
